ai-patthana21.20:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.20:1.1_0: or doing not give rise to corruption of defilement, corruption, and with the corruption of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.20:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.20:2.1_0: or corruption, nor does the teaching because of defilement, without defilement, conditions,
ai-patthana21.20:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.20:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.20:3.1_0: or doing not give rise to defilements, causes and conditions for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana21.20:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
